# General Regulations
General Regulations encompass the Standard Operating procedure, seperated into three differing sections.
The first is [textlink="Definitions" link="Definitions"], this is a dictionary for some important words in General Regulations.
The second is the [textlink="Hiring Procedure" link="HiringProcedure"]. This states how to handle new employees for the station.
The third is [textlink="Right To Refuse Service" link="Rights To Refuse Service"]. This states the crews rights when met with disorderly conduct from other crew.
